entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for March 27, 2024

summary.caption: “For the love of— … Somethin’s been messin’ with these chickens!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for March 27, 2024

summary.caption: “Ohhhhhhh. … Look at that, Schuster. … Dogs are so cute when they try to comprehend quantum mechanics.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for March 27, 2024

summary.caption: “Think about it, Murray. … If we could get this baby runnin’, we could run over hikers, pick up females, chase down mule deer—man, we’d be the grizzlies from hell.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for March 27, 2024

summary.caption:
“Put it back in the rock, Barbara—you couldn’t even 
slice a tomato with that old thing.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for March 27, 2024

summary.caption: “The problem, as I see it, is that you both are extremely adept at pushing each other’s buttons.”
